TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag extends System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeBag
Public NotInheritable Class Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag Inherits Pkcs12SafeBag

summary.span: 表示 PKCS#12 中的 ShroudedKeyBag，即内容为 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的容器。

span.span: Represents the ShroudedKeyBag from PKCS#12, a container whose contents are a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo.

MemberSignature.Value: public Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey, bool skipCopy = false);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey, bool skipCopy) cil managed
Public Sub New (encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), Optional skipCopy As Boolean = false)

param.name: encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey
param.span: BER 编码的 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值。

param.name: skipCopy
param.span: 表示存储 而不进行防御性复制；否则为 。

span.span: to store without making a defensive copy; otherwise, .

summary.span: 根据现有的已编码 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值初始化 的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the from an existing encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证`encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey`是否为单 BER 编码值, 但不验证该值是否为正确的 PKCS # 8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值。This method validates that `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey` is a single BER-encoded value, but it does not verify that the value is a proper PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value. 此方法的默认行为是创建的`encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey`一个防御副本。The default behavior of this method is to make a defensive copy of `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey`. 当参数为`true`时, 将跳过此防御副本。 `skipCopy`When the `skipCopy` parameter is `true`, this defensive copy is skipped. 如果在返回值或其方法或属性生成`encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey`的任何对象的生存期内跳过了该防御副本和更改内容, 则这些对象的方法和属性可能会产生有意义的结果或引发异常由于处于损坏状态。If the defensive copy is skipped and the contents of `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey` change during the lifetime of the returned value or of any object produced by its methods or properties, then methods and properties on those objects may produce nonsense results or throw exceptions due to the corrupted state. 因此, 如果调用方可以合理地`true`确保数据保持`skipCopy`不变, 则建议只使用参数值。Callers are therefore advised to only use a `true` value for the `skipCopy` parameter when they can be reasonably assured that the data will stay intact.

exception.span: 参数不表示单个 ASN.1 BER 编码值。

span.span: The parameter does not represent a single ASN.1 BER-encoded value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte)
public: property ReadOnlyMemory<System::Byte> EncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey { ReadOnlyMemory<System::Byte> get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个内存值，该值包含此包传输的 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值。

span.span: Gets a memory value containing the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value transported by this bag.

value.span: 包含此袋传输的 PKCS # 8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值的内存值。

span.span: A memory value containing the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value transported by this bag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会执行任何验证, 返回的值是有效的 PKCS # 8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值。No validation is performed that the returned value is a valid PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value. 此属性是属性的别名。This property is an alias for the property.
